program: Bye Stress Bye - Stress Relief & Nervous System Recovery
author: Victor Sol√© Ferioli
target_population: Adults experiencing chronic stress, overwhelm, or approaching burnout
level: All levels (designed for depleted nervous systems)

critical_disclaimers.not_a_substitute: This program does NOT replace mental health treatment, therapy, or medication
seek_help_if: Inability to function in daily life

core_philosophy.message: Your nervous system needs safety, not another performance evaluation

what_program_offers: Structured-yet-flexible container for nervous system care
Permission to move slowly and rest often
intentions_not_goals.realistic_expectation: By Week 4, slightly better stress regulation, small sleep improvements, or simply showing up for yourself

focus: Restorative yoga (child's pose, forward fold, legs up wall)
weekly_structure.when_to_use: Starting point, or return when overwhelmed

focus: Dynamic mobility (world's greatest stretch, arm swings, hip circles)
Self-massage and somatic release (foam rolling, tennis ball work)
Cool-down flow (downward dog, forward fold, twists)
Nervous system downregulation (legs up wall, constructive rest, savasana)
Stretch circuit (neck rolls, wall chest opener, forward fold)
weekly_structure.when_to_use: Sleep disruption, high anxiety, wired-but-tired state

focus: Cardio-breath fusion (walk with breath cueing, yoga flow)
Building personal toolkit (3 stress anchor practices)
weekly_structure.important_note: If Week 4 feels like too much, stay in Weeks 1-3

4_7_8_breathing.modification: Try 4-4-6 if 7-count hold is too much

physiological_sigh.pattern: Two quick inhales through nose, long exhale through mouth

daily_micro_practices.name: Nothing
daily_micro_practices.philosophy: Rest is productive. You don't have to earn worthiness.

signs: Consistently feeling worse after sessions for 2+ weeks
considerations: Check for adrenal fatigue, thyroid issues
Right now, rest might be the medicine
when_exercise_makes_things_worse.message: You're not failing. Your body is giving you information.

realistic_expectations.why_thats_okay: This program gives tools, not miracles. Tools you can use again when life gets hard.

post_program_options.option_2: Stay in favorite week (no shame in not advancing)
post_program_options.option_3: Cherry-pick what worked, create custom practice
post_program_options.option_4: Seek additional support (yoga classes, meditation groups, therapy)
post_program_options.long_term_goal: Have nervous system regulation tools accessible anytime, anywhere

legs_up_wall.benefits: Reduces cortisol, improves vagal tone, activates parasympathetic

constructive_rest.position: Back, knees bent, feet flat wider than hips, knees together
constructive_rest.benefits: Body's natural resting position, gentle belly breathing

child_pose.benefits: Home base, decompresses spine, signals safety
child_pose.modifications: Knees wide, pillow under torso for support

supported_savasana.props: Pillow under knees, blanket over body, eye covering
